headline: BEL-ART HIGH SPEED GRINDER
keywords: old v blender mills planatary roll mixer
specstable:
Manufacturer Bel-Art Products
Model Micro-Mill
Description High Speed Grinder
Other Information High-speed grinding of small samples from 20 to 50ml.

Will successfully grind bauxite, bone, ceramics,
coal, Devorda’s alloy, fertilizer, filter paper,
fly ash, frozen tissue, glass, grain, kaolinites,
leaves, limestone, muscle tissue, pharmaceuticals, pigment blends,
plastics, rocks, roots, shale, seeds, slags,
soil, teeth, wood, etc.

Has an aluminum housing with stainless steel insert.
Chamber size: 54mm diam x 25mm deep

Temperature is maintained by means of built-in
heat exchangers

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 5.500 in (14.0 cm)
Depth 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Height 10.500 in (26.7 cm)
Weight 10 lb (5 kg)
